B2 a successful way of curing an illness or dealing with a problem or difficulty: an effective herbal remedy for headaches The best remedy for grief is hard work. legal remedy law

a way of solving a problem or ordering someone to make a payment for harm or damage they have caused, using a decision made in a law court: legal remedy for We have exhausted all possible legal remedies for this injustice.
